public interface RouteApi

      • getByFilter

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                path="",
                produces="application/json")
java.util.List<RouteDto> getByFilter​(@RequestParam("depAirportCode")
                                     java.lang.String depAirportCode,
                                     @RequestParam("arrAirportCode")
                                     java.lang.String arrAirportCode,
                                     @RequestParam("departureDate") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME)
                                     java.time.ZonedDateTime departureDate)
        Gets by filter.
        Parameters:
        depAirportCode - the dep airport code
        arrAirportCode - the arr airport code
        departureDate - the departure date
        Returns:
        the RouteDto matching the filter criteria
